oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PRELIDA - State of the art assessment on linked data and digital preservation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Batsakis, Sotiris
Giaretta, David
Gueret, Christophe
Hogerwerf, Maarten
Isaac, Antoine
Meghini, Carlo
Scharnhorst, Andrea
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Digital Preservation
State of the Art
Linked Data
OAIS model
Preservation of Linked Data
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/H.3.7 Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The state of the art of Linked Data technologies and standards and of Digital Preservation solutions, standards and technologies is presented, along with an analysis of the characteristics of Linked Data that make their preservation different from that of other digital resources (A consolidated version of the report will be published at the end of the project).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: PRELIDA - Preserving Linked Data. Deliverable D3.1, 2014.
